chapter.title: HTML Generation
chapter.para: The website is written as DocBook XML 4.1.2 fragments and compiled into HTML with the Website DTD 2.0.

The website can be compiled with Ant in three steps. First, you need to run ant in the directories cdk/doc/refs and cdk/doc/javadoc. That should generate a biblio.dbx, and keyword.index.xml. Then, run ant in cdk/doc/website/source

After is has been build, it can be checked with a webbrowser in the cdk/doc/website/target directory. Note, that the index.html is named website.html at this moment. That is changed automatically on the server, when it includes the news items.
